description: The carriageway will remain shut until Monday morning for maintenance work.
title: M54 carriageway in Shropshire shuts for maintenance
title_page: M54 carriageway in Shropshire shuts for maintenance - BBC News
maintext:
A stretch of the M54 motorway in Shropshire has been closed for maintenance work.
National Highways said the eastbound carriageway shut between junction four, for east Telford, and junction three, for Cosford, at 20:00 GMT.
It will remain closed until 06:00 on Monday.
The organisation has said diversions are in place on local roads.
